short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save yourself from embarrasing moments and make your mic auto disable when a Google Meet window is not in focus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We've all been there, we join a Google meet and then forget we're in it once we start working. Little do you know, that conversation you just had with your dog was broadcasted to the whole meet. This plugin automatically detects when the meet tab is in focus and if it's not, it automatically mutes you.
